get.summary: Get localized string of various codes in Invoice.
get.description: Returns the  localized string of various codes in Invoice.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Valid types are -    approvalStatus, paymentStatus, expenseType, ledgerCode, dataSourceCode, payMethod, receiptConfirmation, unitOfMeasure.

parameters.name: langCode
parameters.description: Optional. The language code requested. lang codes examples - de, en, es, fr, fr_CA, hu, it, ja, pl, pt_BR

Code.description: The localized value based on langcode and type.

LangCode.description: The localized value based on langcode and type.

LocalizedValue.description: The localized value based on langcode and type.
